title: Steganography Distortion Learning Utilizing Variations in Generative Images

context.prior_knowledge: Basic steganography concepts, foundational image processing, and introductory machine learning knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners analyze generative image variation characteristics using BYOD devices, implement practical steganography projects, and are evaluated with emphasis on team-based collaboration and experimental approaches

learning_goals: Learners can explain steganographic distortion modeling methods by analyzing subtle variation patterns in generated images.
Learners can implement a system that disguises hidden images as natural variation images using GAN-based training strategies.
Learners can complete a project demonstrating a detection error rate improvement of at least 3% for three or more steganography detection techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
